label: 別所
本: Land, Power, and the Sacred The Estate System in Medieval Japan . University of Hawai'i Press . 2018
著者: Goodwin, Janet R. (ed.)/ Piggott, Joan R. (ed.)
説明文: autonomous temple. The term particularly designates several small temples used by Chōgen as bases for his fundraising activities on behalf of Tōdaiji.
